description: Build a simple note-taking mobile application with React Native/Expo demonstrating the complete blueprint workflow

tasks.title: Setup React Native project structure
tasks.description:
Configure React Native/Expo project with proper organization and navigation.

## Tasks
- Setup React Navigation with stack navigator
- Create screens and components directories
- Configure TypeScript strict mode
- Add global styles and theme
- Setup SafeAreaView for iOS notch handling
acceptanceCriteria: App runs on iOS and Android

tasks.title: Create Note data model with AsyncStorage
tasks.description:
Define Note interface and implement AsyncStorage for data persistence.

## Implementation
- Define Note interface (id, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt)
- Setup AsyncStorage helpers
- Create CRUD utility functions (create, read, update, delete)
- Add sample data for testing
- Implement data migration helpers
acceptanceCriteria: AsyncStorage saves and retrieves data correctly

tasks.title: Build Note list screen with FlatList
tasks.description:
Create the main screen displaying all notes using FlatList.

## Components
- NoteListScreen with FlatList
- NoteItem component with title and preview
- EmptyState component (when no notes)
- Pull-to-refresh functionality
- Swipe actions (delete, edit)
acceptanceCriteria: Empty state displays when no notes

tasks.title: Add create/edit/delete Note functionality
tasks.description:
Implement full CRUD operations for notes with native mobile UX.

## Features
- NoteEditor screen with TextInput
- Create new note button (FloatingActionButton)
- Edit existing note navigation
- Delete with native confirmation dialog
- Auto-save on navigation
- Keyboard handling (dismiss on scroll)

tasks.title: Add note search and filtering
tasks.description:
Implement search functionality with mobile-optimized UX.

## Implementation
- Search bar in header
- Real-time search (debounced)
- Filter by date (newest/oldest)
- Clear search button
- Search results count
- Highlight search terms in results
